text: Ara yakhana amara prerita pheresatagana lutera kache asala, takhana tadera jan'ya tini bisanna haye paralena ebam nijeke tadera raksaya asamartha mane karalena. Ara tara balala, â€˜bhaya karabena na, duhkha'o karabena na; amara apanake o apanara parijanabargake raksa karaba, apanara stri chara; se to pichane abasthanakaridera antarbhukta
